playArea.value: Explore different ways to generate waves on a string that stretches across the play area.  The string can be attached to a wrench to move manually or to oscillators that move continuously or pulse when you choose.  Changing the way you make waves provides different properties of the waves and the string for you to tune in the control area.  Decide how the end of the string should be attached to the end of the play area or allow it to extend into infinity.

controlArea.value: Change the properties of the oscillators and of the string.

start.value:
{ $isPlaying ->
  [false] The sim is paused while the
  *[true] The
} { $mode ->
  [manual] wrench clamped to the string is near the { $wrenchPosition ->
      [bottom] bottom
      *[middle] middle
      [top] top
    } of the play area
  *[other] { $mode ->
    [oscillate] oscillator
    *[pulse] pulse generator
  } is { $active ->
    [true] generating a { $mode ->
      [oscillate] wave
      *[pulse] pulse
    } that begins with { $amplitude ->
      [zero] zero
      [low] low
      [medium] medium
      *[high] high
    } amplitude and { $frequency ->
      [zero] zero
      [low] low
      [medium] medium
      *[high] high
    } frequency
    *[false] stationary 
  } in the play area
}, and the string is { $isFlat ->
  *[true] flat
  [false] in motion
}.

end.value:
The end of the string { $endPosition ->
  *[fixed] is fixed to a clamp.
  [loose] is attached to a ring that moves along a rod.
  [no] extends out to infinity through a window outside.
}

interactionHint.value: Move the wrench to make a wave or choose another way to start making waves.

activeMeasurementToolsDescription.value: Tools to visually measure properties of waves. Pause the sim to help make precise measurements.

waveAndStringPropertiesDescription.value: Controls to change the properties of the generated wave and the string.

measurementToolsDescription.value: Tools to visually measure properties of waves. Pause the sim to help make precise measurements.

accessibleHelpText.value: Create wave manually, continuously, or with individual pulses.
Set attachment for the end of the string.
Move the wrench up and down to drag the string and make a wave.
Trigger a single wave pulse along the string.
Drag to line up and visually measure wave length.
Drag to line up and visually measure wave amplitude.
Move and visually line up with waves to compare amplitude changes.
Crest to crest height of the wave.
Width of the generated pulse in seconds.
Amount of energy lost to the environment.

description.value: Reset Shape with { $altOrOption } plus Shift plus R.
